title: EP 108: The Mama Boo Episode
itunes:title: EP 108: The Mama Boo Episode
description:
In this EP we tap in with Athens Park's own "Mama Boo". We discuss her rise from rebellious teenage gangster who had difficulty reading to college graduate, entrepreneur and soon to be council woman.

"Mama Boo" tells us why she isn't bitter at her Childs absentee father, what sparked the change in her life and offers a word of advice to young girls across the country.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
